br.com.caelum.vraptor.ioc

Interface Container

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CDIBasedContainer

    public interface Container
    Class responsible to get instances for components.
    Author:
    Guilherme Silveira

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T> boolean canProvide(Class<T> type)
      Returns true if this container can provide an instance for the given class, false otherwise.
      <T> T instanceFor(Class<T> type)
      Retrieves the appropriate instance for the given class.

    • Method Detail

      • instanceFor

        <T> T instanceFor(Class<T> type)
        Retrieves the appropriate instance for the given class. If the container can't provide a properly instance an exception occurs.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        type - of the required component
        Returns:
        the instance for registered component

      • canProvide

        <T> boolean canProvide(Class<T> type)
        Returns true if this container can provide an instance for the given class, false otherwise.
        Type Parameters:
        T -
        Parameters:
        type - of the required component
        Returns:
        true iff instanceFor(type) can return a valid instance.
